about_the_game:
Sail on your own, fish, explore islands, and live the ultimate yachting lifestyle. Whether you're a seasoned sailor or new to the open waters, the freedom of yacht life is yours to enjoy.

Explore the Open Waters

The ocean is your playground. Navigate through stunning waterscapes, discovering hidden gems and exotic islands. This isn’t just a game; it’s your maritime adventure.

Choose Your Ideal Spots

Your yachting choices are as vast as the sea itself. Choose your ideal spots from a variety of locations, each offering unique experiences and challenges. Prefer a serene lagoon or an adventurous island? The choice is yours, and it influences your game.

Customize Your Yacht

Select from a range of yachts, from modern designs to luxurious classics, each with distinct features. Customize your yacht with upgrades, sell it for profit, or turn it into a masterpiece of your own design. Your decision!

Dynamic Weather

Weather plays a crucial role in your adventure. A sunny day might be perfect for a fishing trip, while a stormy night adds a thrilling challenge to your voyage. Adapt your strategy and embrace the dynamic weather patterns for an immersive experience.

Engage with Customers

Interact with customers through your in-game social media page. Like their photos, post your own, and engage with comments. Schedule island tours, meet new clients, and earn money to expand your yachting empire.

Expand and Upgrade

Invest in food and drinks for your trips, fish and sell your catch, upgrade your yacht’s interiors, rent boats, or hire crew members for automated tours.




The freedom of the sea is yours. There's much more to discover. Are you ready to set sail and create your own adventure?
